x LET*S FIND OUT is an audience participation program for which some prepara- x
x tion is needed in advance of the broadcasts. For this reason no station x
x should attempt to use this series unless the handbook is made available to x
x the teachers at least two weeks in advance of the programs. x
x x
x The materials to be used by the children in their classrooms are easily x
x available in school or may be brought from home by the children. x
x x
x During the actual production of this series, a group of children was in the x
studio. In some of the programs their voices are quite audible, in others x
x we have purposely not allowed them to be heard. When the studio children x
x are heard, attention is called to their answers so that the listeners in the x
x classrooms will not respond. *
x x
x This series is planned for the season of the fall semester. x
x x
x Station KSLH will be anxious to receive your comments on this series of pro- x
x grams. x
x x
x *
